COURT

YEAR

2021

ROLE

Graphic designer

Web developer

Court is a collective whose mission is to ensure all communities have a safe and inviting place to get together. They renovate public places and install large scale art-works in order to strengthen communities and inspire people to think more critically and creatively about their environment. They collaborated with the municipal Sport Department for the renovation of the basketball playground.
